description: Number of letters in n-th Catalan number.
references: J. Gili, Catalan Grammar, Dolphin. Oxford 1993, p. 39.
R. P. Stanley, Enumerative Combinatorics, vol. 2, problem 6.24.
links: Index entries for sequences related to number of letters in n
example: In Catalan: un, dos, tres, quatre, cinc, sis, set, vuit, nou, deu, onze, dotze, tretze, catorze, quinze, setze, disset, divuit, dinou, vint, ...
author: _N. J. A. Sloane_ and Richard Borcherds, Dec 09 1999
extensions: More terms from F. Xavier Noria (fxn(AT)retemail.es) and Manuel Valdivia Prades (mvaldivia(AT)ugr.es), Dec 10 1999
